title: Circuit Current Simulation
description: An interactive simulation demonstrating electric current flow through a circuit with a battery and resistor. Users can switch between conventional current and electron flow views, and adjust voltage and resistance to see how current speed changes according to Ohm's Law (I = V/R).
creator: Dan McCreary
